node.title: On what column do you wrap your code?
node.choices: 72 -- Doesn't everybody? 20 -- I use a Zaurus. 78 -- Isn't this the standard? 180 -- I have a wide screen! 120 -- Eighty chars just isn't enough. Real programmers don't wrap their code. 64 -- Because its such a nice number.... 50 -- My wife won't let me upgrade my 15 inch monitor.... I never wrap two lines at the same column. Aren't wraps something you eat for lunch? 80 -- 'Cause I like to... Wherever my boss says I have to. 79 -- Rank doth have its priviledges I am a free spirit and wrap as I like when I like....
